en.summary: Part of the security squad that works on developing secure payment gateway integrations. Currently, 4 integrations have been developed with the consequent achievement of PCI DDS compliance certificate.
Design and development of combat and navigation microservices for Navantia S.A, as part of the C4IP project aiming at modernizing the architecture of the Spanish Navy systems.
Integration of sensors into the new combat system of the F110 frigates of the Spanish Navy. Integrating new functionalities into a legacy C++ codebase of millions of lines.

Full-Stack development of renewable energy plant integrations within the Bluence environment. Successfully integrated more than 10 plants. From business development in .NET/C# to UI/UX design and implementation in JavaPages Server and JavaScript. Led a team during the last 10 months at Isotrol.

es.summary: Parte del equipo de seguridad desarrollando integraciones de pasarelas de pago securizadas. Hasta el momento, 4 integraciones desarrolladas con la consecuente obtención del certificado de cumplimiento de la normativa PCI DSS.
Diseño y desarrollo de microservicios de combate y navegación para Navantia S.A, como parte del proyecto C4IP que busca la modernización en la arquitectura de los sistemas de la armada española.
Integración de sensores dentro del nuevo sistema de combate de las fragatas F110 de la armada española. Integrando nuevas funcionalidades en un código legacy C++ de millones de lineas.
